dct_title_s: Übersicht der Trigonometrischen & Nautischen aufnehmen in Kaplande bis 1867
dct_description_sm: Trigonometrical and navigational map of the southern portion of the Cape of Good Hope showing the southern African coast from St Helena Bay, Saldanha Bay and False Bay in the south and west to Cape Morgan in the east and the Compassberg in the north.
Relief shown by spot heights. Depths shown by contours and soundings.
Bar scale on map given in "Deutsche Meilen."
Inset map: Südliches Ende der Agulhas Bank [the southern end of the Agulhas Bank].
Mittheilungen aus Justus Perthes' geographischer Anstalt über wichtige neue Erforschungen auf dem Gesammtgebiete der Geographie / von A. Petermann. Gotha : Justus Perthes, 1868.
dct_spatial_sm: Good Hope, Cape of (South Africa : Cape)
dct_rights_sm: Image courtesy University of Cape Town Libraries, Special Collections: Maps scanned under the William and Yvonne Jacobson Digital Africana Program at UCT. If you have questions, please contact David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
